Articles.Content: Banned by the Cheese Elemental.

Banned for making me think you said Elemental Cheese (which I would assume would be either hard as a rock, wet as water or very gassy).

As for Emmental cheese. Is that when you imagine you have recieved an Email that contains cheese? Wouldn't a postal delivery be better. Quick delivery, special rates if you provide us with enough info to steal your identity. There in 3 days or we will give you extra mould gratis.

Hmm, it looks like I got ninja'd writing this. But I put in effort so I am keeping this one, guess we will see what got posted.

 

Ah Ha. It was Kerbiloid. First sentence should cover it.

Edited November 19, 2022 by ColdJ

New page ban teehee

for those curious: Emmental, Emmentaler, or Emmenthal is a yellow, medium-hard cheese that originated in the area around Emmental, in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. It is classified as a Swiss-type or Alpine cheese.

052511192022

new page whee
Banned because I have driven through Bern. And all I can lay claim to is the driving through and the stopping at a rest stop diner to have some lunch. Couldn't describe anything else there.

Banned for driving through Burn Cantine which is in Switcherland which is rich with Emmen tals, talers, and thals, and thus gave the name to Emmerich The Director who is a Master-Disaster in Holy Wood.
